title: Elegant serif
content:
I need someone to help me with this font.  
 [http://www.graphic-exchange.com/images/03print/lulamag/lula04.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829182642/http:/www.graphic-exchange.com/images/03print/lulamag/lula04.jpg "http://www.graphic-exchange.com/images/03print/lulamag/lula04.jpg")
author: N1kkel

comments.content: It is Kursivschrift stehend for the lowercase letters.

10x  
I was almost sure that the Uppercase is custom so I think this is it.
Ah I see now that this is from the Lula-Mag. So here is more [to read](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829182642/http:/typophile.com/node/35526).
